summary: The work spans multiple product teams working on e-commerce improvements including OTP (One-Time Purchase) functionality, Factor Form product expansion, and Good Chop funnel monitoring. Key focus areas include fixing shipping threshold bugs, building new product pages for meal shakes and creatine, implementing order history features, and establishing monitoring infrastructure for critical user journeys.

decisions.what: Update discount banner copy to show consistent voucher discount communications across the funnel
decisions.rationale: Ensure RTE active customers with 50% year voucher see consistent discount information throughout their journey

decisions.what: Add fallback content to product card discount banner
decisions.rationale: Address edge cases where discount information might not be available

decisions.what: Implement anomaly detection alerts for Good Chop funnel CTAs
decisions.rationale: Proactively monitor funnel health and enable faster response times to issues

decisions.what: Add tracing for discount banner component rendering
decisions.rationale: Track critical path component to catch issues when banner is not displayed for customers with free benefits

initiatives.name: Factor Form New Product Launch
initiatives.description: Expand Factor Form product catalog with meal shakes and creatine, including new PDPs, product cards, cart integration, and delivery management

initiatives.name: OTP Dashboard Enhancement
initiatives.description: Build comprehensive OTP order management dashboard with order listing, details drawer, and graduation banner functionality

initiatives.name: Good Chop Funnel Monitoring
initiatives.description: Establish end-to-end monitoring infrastructure for Good Chop funnel including alerts, tracing, and runbook updates

initiatives.name: Delivery Quick Wins Q1 2026
initiatives.description: Collection of delivery-related improvements and optimizations planned for Q1 2026

initiatives.name: Order History Fallback Implementation
initiatives.description: Implement empty state handling for Factor Form and Factor customers when no order history exists

blockers.description: OTP free shipping threshold incorrectly set to $50 instead of $65 in UAT environment
blockers.impact: Customers seeing incorrect free shipping eligibility in cart and order summary

blockers.description: Shipping fee not reflecting cart details on sign up page
blockers.impact: Anonymous users see incorrect shipping costs during checkout

blockers.description: Runbook contains outdated query with deprecated span
blockers.impact: Reschedule alert monitoring may not function correctly

entities.name: Factor Form

entities.context: Brand receiving funnel monitoring improvements and OTP dashboard enhancements

entities.context: Backend service providing OTP orders endpoint for dashboard

entities.context: Testing framework for pre-checkout journey validation

entities.context: Google Tag Manager for tracking graduation banner events

entities.name: Meal Shake
entities.context: New product being added to Factor Form catalog with dedicated PDP and product card

entities.name: Creatine
entities.context: New product being added to Factor Form catalog with dedicated PDP and product card

entities.name: OTP (One-Time Purchase)
entities.context: Order type requiring dashboard, monitoring, and shipping threshold fixes

technical_patterns.pattern: Component-level tracing for critical UI elements
technical_patterns.context: Adding traces to discount banner component rendering to catch display issues and monitor component lifecycle

technical_patterns.pattern: GA anomaly detection for funnel monitoring
technical_patterns.context: Proactive monitoring approach using Google Analytics anomaly detection for each funnel CTA to enable faster incident response
Creating hooks to request and transform OTP orders data from backend API to make it display-ready for UI components

technical_patterns.pattern: Schema and type updates for product expansion
technical_patterns.context: Updating core product schema and types to support new product categories (meal shakes, creatine) with proper encoding/decoding
Adding translation keys in codebase for new products to support internationalization
Implementing fallback content for order history and discount banners when data is unavailable

technical_patterns.pattern: Cypress end-to-end testing for checkout flows
technical_patterns.context: Validating OTP pre-checkout journey including voucher application, SKU validation, and pricing verification
Using drawer component to display OTP order details and pricing information

dependencies.context: Dashboard page depends on reactivation_bff endpoint for fetching OTP orders data
New product pages require translation keys to be added before implementation
Alert infrastructure depends on Honeycomb for trace collection and anomaly detection
Product cards depend on updated schema and types to support new product categories
Banner tracking depends on GTM event implementation for analytics
Cart must integrate new product selections from meal shake and creatine components
